# Cross sections for HCO+
# Converted from earlier Leiden database cross sections by Alan Heays 2016-02-24
# Photodissociation source: HCO+ 1 1Pi photodissociation cf. Koch et al. 1995, JCP
# Lines represented with gaussian of width 1.0 nm FWHM
# wavelength: (nm)
# photoabsorption:    cross section (cm2)
# photodissociation:  cross section (cm2)
# 
# wavelength   photoabsorption photodissociation
